description: I18N_CONFIG.ns in packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts is ['common'] (not ['common', 'client-portal', 'msp'])
I18N_CONFIG.ns in packages/core/src/lib/i18n/config.ts is ['common'] (synced with ui config)
ROUTE_NAMESPACES constant is exported from packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts
ROUTE_NAMESPACES maps '/client-portal' to ['common', 'client-portal']
ROUTE_NAMESPACES maps '/client-portal/tickets' to ['common', 'client-portal', 'features/tickets']
ROUTE_NAMESPACES maps '/msp' to ['common', 'msp/core'] (at minimum)
ROUTE_NAMESPACES maps '/msp/tickets' to ['common', 'msp/core', 'features/tickets']
ROUTE_NAMESPACES maps '/msp/settings' to ['common', 'msp/core']
All ROUTE_NAMESPACES MSP entries use 'msp/core' (not 'msp')
getNamespacesForRoute is exported from packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts
getNamespacesForRoute('/msp/tickets') returns namespaces including 'msp/core' and 'features/tickets'
getNamespacesForRoute('/client-portal/billing') returns namespaces including 'client-portal' and 'features/billing'
getNamespacesForRoute exact match takes priority over prefix match (e.g., '/msp/tickets' exact entry wins over '/msp' prefix)
getNamespacesForRoute uses longest prefix match when no exact match (e.g., '/msp/tickets/123' matches '/msp/tickets' entry)
getNamespacesForRoute falls back to ['common'] for unknown routes
I18nProvider accepts optional namespaces prop (string[])
I18nProvider calls i18next.loadNamespaces() for namespaces not yet loaded when namespaces prop is provided
I18nProvider loads new namespaces when namespaces prop changes (simulating route navigation)
I18nProvider does not re-load namespaces that are already loaded
I18nWrapper uses usePathname() to read the current route
I18nWrapper calls getNamespacesForRoute(pathname) and passes result as namespaces prop to I18nProvider
I18nWrapper re-resolves namespaces when pathname changes (route navigation triggers new namespace resolution)
scripts/generate-pseudo-locale.ts exists and is runnable
Pseudo-locale script accepts --locale and --fill CLI arguments
Pseudo-locale script with --locale xx --fill 1111 generates files under server/public/locales/xx/
Pseudo-locale script reads all English namespace JSON files including nested features/ and msp/ directories
Pseudo-locale script output preserves directory structure (e.g., features/tickets.json -> xx/features/tickets.json)
Pseudo-locale script replaces all leaf string values with the fill string
Pseudo-locale script preserves {{variables}} within fill strings (e.g., '1111 {{name}} 1111' for a value containing {{name}})
Pseudo-locale script preserves multiple {{variables}} in a single value (e.g., 'Page {{current}} of {{total}}')
Pseudo-locale script preserves JSON key structure exactly (nested objects maintained, no flattening)
Pseudo-locale output for common.json has same key structure as en/common.json but all leaf values replaced
Pseudo-locales xx and yy are added to LOCALE_CONFIG.supportedLocales
Pseudo-locales xx and yy are present in LOCALE_CONFIG.supportedLocales in all environments
Pseudo-locales xx and yy are added to I18N_CONFIG.supportedLngs
server/public/locales/en/msp/core.json exists with same content as old msp.json
server/public/locales/{lang}/msp/core.json exists for all 7 languages (en, fr, es, de, nl, it, pl)
Old server/public/locales/{lang}/msp.json files are removed for all 7 languages
No useTranslation('msp') references remain in source code (only 'msp/core')
Phase 1 test file references updated from 'msp' to 'msp/core' namespace
i18next.t('nav.home', { ns: 'msp/core' }) returns correct English translation after namespace rename
packages/core/src/lib/i18n/config.ts I18N_CONFIG.ns is synced to ['common']
packages/core/src/lib/i18n/config.ts LOCALE_CONFIG matches packages/ui/src/lib/i18n/config.ts (including any pseudo-locale changes)
Client portal at /client-portal loads common and client-portal namespaces correctly
Client portal at /client-portal/tickets loads features/tickets namespace in addition to common and client-portal
Client portal translations continue displaying correctly after config changes (no regressions)
MSP portal with flag OFF: no I18nWrapper rendered, no namespace HTTP requests for msp/core
MSP portal with flag OFF: layout renders identically to before changes (zero behavior change)
MSP portal with flag ON: msp/core namespace loads correctly via lazy loading
MSP portal with flag ON: navigating to /msp/tickets loads features/tickets namespace in addition to msp/core
Phase 1 tests pass with updated namespace reference msp/core instead of msp
npm run build succeeds with no TypeScript errors after all changes
